title: Base-Image Setup
body:
Hi,
It seems to me, that the Base-Image runs some sort of FirstRun-Setup everytime a Centennial installation is executed. (Like Installing drivers for Hardware present)
Wouldn't it be better to Call this Firstrun-Setup once, and apply it to the base setup?

comments.body:
It good to have a clean base image, in that case, what about running it once, and storing the diff in a separate folder, witch is applied on top of the base image before the normal execution starts?
My intent is to reduce/remove the setup witch basically does the same every time.
